text: Peter Linz (born June 28, 1967) is an American puppeteer and voice actor. He is best known for his work with the Muppets. His most prominent role is performing for the character Walter who was introduced in the 2011 feature film The Muppets. Since 1991, Linz has performed on Sesame Street, where he later took on the roles of Herry Monster and Ernie on Sesame Street in 2017. Category:Living people Category:1967 births
title: Peter Linz
